ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all I talk to the rest of the council and since a lot of you wanted to make a sequel I decide to make a poll for the following catagories: Best story-line

Hey all I talk to the rest of the council and since a lot of you 
wanted to make a sequel I decide to make a poll for the following 
catagories: Best story-line creator, Best male character, Best female 
charater, Best arrival sequence, Best departure/death sequence, Best 
Love Story (basically the two charaters who have had the longest and 
mushyest romance.), Best villian, Best hero, Best leader overall, 
Strangest Character, and Most ignored/inisgnificant character.

Well those are the catagories.  I need some nominations so please 
send me an email.   This is form the begining of the RPG till now.
